issue.title: [Java] Use new implementation to concat vectors values in batch
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7546](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7546). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Per discussion https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5945#discussion_r365108806.

In ARROW-7284, we write a simple method to concat vectors. However, ARROW-7073 is about to concat vector values efficiently, after this PR merged, we should use this new implementation in `ArrowReader`.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7546?focusedCommentId=17038782) by Micah Kornfield (emkornfield@gmail.com):*
Issue resolved by pull request 6431
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6431>
